## 9. ë°°í¬ ìƒíƒœ

### Production
- Frontend: Vercel (`max-meeting.vercel.app`)
- Backend: ETì„œë²„ (`api.meeting.etlab.kr`, systemd)
- Database: PostgreSQL (`localhost:5432/maxmeeting`)
- Redis: `localhost:6379/0`

### Services
```bash
sudo systemctl status maxmeeting-api      # FastAPI (port 9000)
sudo systemctl status maxmeeting-worker   # Celery Worker
sudo systemctl status caddy               # Reverse Proxy
```

### Monitoring
```bash
# API ë¡œê·¸
sudo journalctl -u maxmeeting-api -f

# ì›Œì»¤ ë¡œê·¸ (STT/LLM)
sudo journalctl -u maxmeeting-worker -f

# Caddy ë¡œê·¸
sudo journalctl -u caddy -f
```
